zh-cn: 湖南省西路公立师范学堂
湖南省公立第二师范学校
湖南省常德市第一中学

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省著名重点中学、湖南省重点学校、全国现代教育技术实验学校。
description.en: A famous key middle school, provincial key school, and national modern educational technology experimental school in Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、教育家，创办了西路师范讲习所（常德市第一中学前身）。
description.en: A Chinese politician and educator who founded the West Route Normal School (the predecessor of Changde No. 1 Middle School).

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆对在教学质量、学校管理、师资、教学设施等多方面都比较出色的中学的非官方称呼。
description.en: An unofficial designation for middle schools in mainland China that excel in teaching quality, school management, faculty, and facilities.

description.zh-cn: 一所与常德市第一中学关系密切的学校。
description.en: A school closely associated with Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任教育部长。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China, who served as Minister of Education.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国中央精神文明建设指导委员会办公室、中华人民共和国教育部联合评选授予的荣誉称号。
description.en: An honorary title jointly awarded by the Office of the Central Spiritual Civilization Construction Steering Commission and the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A modern Chinese revolutionary and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese politician and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and an alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期党员，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: An early member of the Communist Party of China and an alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and an alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and an alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and an alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国化学家、实业家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese chemist, industrialist, and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、农学家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese educator, agronomist, and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese historian and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese economist and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中纪委副书记，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, former Deputy Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese military figure and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，汪精卫政权特务头子，常德市第一中学校友。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, head of the secret service of the Wang Jingwei regime, and alumnus of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 1902年，熊希龄创建了常德市第一中学的前身西路师范讲习所。
description.en: In 1902, Xiong Xiling founded the West Route Normal School, the predecessor of Changde No. 1 Middle School.

description.zh-cn: 常德市第一中学是湖南省著名重点中学。
description.en: Changde No. 1 Middle School is a famous key middle school in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 常德市第一中学的教学班编制中包含常德育才学校。
description.en: The teaching class structure of Changde No. 1 Middle School includes Changde Yucai School.

description.zh-cn: 1939年，时任民国政府教育部长陈立夫批示常德市第一中学前身为“全国最善之公立高中”，以肯定其办学水平。
description.en: In 1939, Chen Lifu, then Minister of Education of the Republic of China, designated the predecessor of Changde No. 1 Middle School as the 'best public high school in the nation', affirming its educational excellence.

description.zh-cn: 常德市第一中学是全国文明校园之一。
description.en: Changde No. 1 Middle School is one of the National Civilized Campuses.
